Name: Rum Amandine
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
2 dash Orange blossom water / Orange flower water
15 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: A classic Daiquiri benefiting from the influence of maraschino, almond and absinthe.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Marcis Dzelzainis at Quo Vadis in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Rum Amandine contains 159 calories
